INSERT INTO api_wf.plan_communications (plan_id, from_agent, to_agent, type, subject, message, created_by) VALUES (60, 'Claude', 'Paul', 'enhancement', 'SessionCache LUOW - Massive Performance Breakthrough', 'BREAKTHROUGH: SessionCache LUOW eliminates ALL session parameter database calls!

PERFORMANCE IMPACT:
• firstName: 2 getVals → 0 getVals (100% elimination)
• account_id: 1 getVal → 0 getVals (100% elimination)
• userEmail: 2 getVals → 0 getVals (100% elimination)

IMPLEMENTATION COMPLETE:
• Created SessionCache.js with TTL-based session caching
• Enhanced App.jsx for automatic session data population
• Optimized TriggerEngine.js for getVal token resolution

ARCHITECTURE EVOLUTION:
Completes comprehensive caching strategy:
1. FormDataResolver LUOW - Smart form resolution
2. OptionsCache LUOW - TTL select widget caching
3. SessionCache LUOW - Session parameter elimination
4. NavigationEfficiency LUOW - Context store optimization

This represents a fundamental shift from reactive database calls to proactive client-side caching.

STATUS: Ready for user testing and telemetry validation

Files Modified:
• rendering/utils/SessionCache.js (NEW)
• App.jsx (enhanced)
• TriggerEngine.js (optimized)', 'claude@whatsfresh.ai')
